mapper.select: SELECT p.seq_user_id, p.reg_date, p.mod_date, p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_cnt, p.product_price, p.product_desc, p.product_img, p.product_thumbImg, p.category, p.sale, p.discount, p.weight, p.attention, p.valid_date, p.use_info, p.country, rating FROM product p LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) as rating FROM product_reply group by product_id) pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE p.category = #{category} AND p.sale = 'Y' ORDER BY p.reg_date DESC LIMIT 0, 4
SELECT * FROM product p, store s WHERE p.product_id = #{product_id} AND s.seq_user_id = p.seq_user_id
SELECT * FROM product WHERE seq_user_id = #{seq_user_id} AND product_id != #{product_id} AND sale = 'Y' AND product_cnt > 0 LIMIT 8

SELECT od.seq_user_id, od.order_id, od.order_detail_id, od.product_id, od.amount, od.order_date, od.product_price, od.product_name, pr.content, pr.rating, pr.answer, pr.reg_date, pr.mod_date FROM order_detail od LEFT JOIN product_reply pr ON od.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE od.seq_user_id = #{seq_user_id} AND od.product_id = #{product_id} GROUP BY product_id

SELECT ud.seq_user_id, ud.user_id, ud.user_name, ud.auth, od.order_id, od.order_detail_id, od.product_id, od.amount, od.order_date, od.product_price, od.product_name, pr.content, pr.rating, pr.answer, pr.reg_date, pr.mod_date FROM user_data ud INNER JOIN order_detail od ON ud.seq_user_id = od.seq_user_id LEFT JOIN product_reply pr ON od.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE od.seq_user_id = #{seq_user_id}

SELECT p.product_id product_id, p.product_name product_name, p.product_thumbImg product_thumbImg, p.product_price product_price, p.discount discount, COUNT(*) reply_count, AVG(rating) rating FROM product_reply pr INNER JOIN product p ON pr.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY rating DESC, reply_count DESC LIMIT 0, 12
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( seq_user_id, product_name, product_cnt, product_price, product_desc, product_img, product_thumbImg, category, sale, discount, weight, attention, valid_date, use_info, country ) VALUES ( #{seq_user_id}, #{product_name}, #{product_cnt}, #{product_price}, #{product_desc}, #{product_img}, #{product_thumbImg}, #{category}, #{sale}, #{discount}, #{weight}, #{attention}, #{valid_date}, #{use_info}, #{country} )
